name: Citywide Violence Reduction Services Parcel Tax
title: Citywide Violence Reduction Services Parcel Tax
summary: This measure would extend and increase both the existing parking tax surcharge to 10% and the existing parcel tax to $198 annually, with exemptions and reductions, for 9 years to fund violence reduction services such as 911 dispatch, community policy, mobile crisis responders, and increase police and fire minimum staffing.

supporting_organizations.name: California Workers' Justice Coalition sponsored by Service Employees International Union Local 1021
supporting_organizations.payee: California Workers' Justice Coalition sponsored by Service Employees International Union Local 1021

supporting_organizations.name: Oaklanders Together - For A Safer Oakland
